description:
**Responsibilities**

* Identifies staffing needs
* Writes job descriptions for needed positions
* Constructs and develops a recruitment system for the company
* Creates a recruitment network on social media and other mediums
* Interview candidates (via phone, video and in-person)Presents a shortlist of candidates to management
* Prepare and distribute assignments and numerical, language and logical reasoning tests
* Send job offer emails and answer queries about compensation and benefits
* Plan Employee Engagement Activity
* Act as a consultant to new hires and help them onboard
* Travel to Umbergaon(Factory) when required
* Run HR related systems
* Advertise job openings on company’s careers page, social media, job boards and internally
* Handle end to end recruitment, onboarding and trainings

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor's degree Human Resources Management, Organizational Psychology or relevant field

**Experience**

* 1-2 years

**Skill Requirement**

* Proficient in MS Office
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills
* Detail-oriented interviewer
* Great decision-making skills
* Negotiation Skill
* Aware about various job portals

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: ₹18,000.00 - ₹27,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Provident Fund

**Small business dedicated to serve Government Contracting, Commercial & School needs in Construction and Telecommunication is looking for a Lead Manager with vast experience in these areas. This position is responsible for managing day-to-day activities/schedules within our company**.

**A Lead full of energy with goals that align with our company; desire to grow, teamwork, support and learn from each other, ready for challenges and improvements. Our company is expanding and always looking for new opportunities.** 

Very fast pace and techy environment that utilizes key tools like:

* scrum board asana (similar to monday.com)
* scheduling applications like Buddy Punch
* Communicate all day - in person - as well as through Webex, email and phone calls
* Microsoft Office specially Excel and Quickbooks

7:30am the day starts getting our techs ready for any successful day. And it ends, once #1. All the job sites are safely closed and daily notes are documented; #2. The most urgent or critical tasks that need immediate attention, including those discussed during the daily stand-up meeting, have been either taken care of or finished for the day. And finally, #3. The detailed plan for the following workday has been finalized and shared with every team member who needs to be aware of the tasks and deadlines for the upcoming day.

**MAIN ROLE**

Outgoing, flexible, highly organized, and ready to assist/guide the team with any questions or needs related to admin tasks.

* Overseeing the general running of the office, the shop and job site schedules.
* Staff management: Delegating work & managing staff workload.
* Key essential role: follow up and follow up and follow up until tasks/processes are fully known and implemented.
* Communication: Make sure team members, customer and or vendors inquiries are addressed.
* Main representative for Administrative areas in the company: HR, Accounting, Purchasing, and Business Development.
* Budgeting: Making sure office and job expenses are managed as per budgets established.
* Company Health and safety: Reviewing and updating company, health and safety policies, and ensuring they're observed
* Data protection: Checking that data protection laws are being adhered to, and reviewing and updating policies
* Office layout: Organizing the office layout and arranging for necessary relocation or repairs
* Training: Ensuring trainings for all levels, including new team members- are followed until completion. Also promotes staff development.
* Ensure the quality and compliance of office documents through meticulous review for accuracy and completeness.
* Actively contribute to process improvement initiatives by providing support for implementation and sharing best practices for overall efficiency enhancement.
* Coordinate and assist in organizing office meetings, track action items, and maintain schedules.
* Support various office activities, ensuring tasks are completed on time and maintaining overall office quality.
* **Main Task**: Create a healthy work environment. **Goal**: Find tools and methods for employees to share their concerns and ideas. **Action**: Communicate these concerns and ideas to management to find solutions.

**BENEFITS:**

At ACG, we ask a lot of our employees, which is why we give so much in return! You can expect:

* Competitive salary with room for growth based on skills and initiative.
* Small business with opportunity to grow within the company
* Medical/Dental/Vision Insurance: Sign up for our health benefits package to get the most out of your options!
* Earned PTO: Begin earning PTO after your 90 probationary period so that you can take the vacation you've always dreamed of!
* 401(k) Matching: We are planning for our future and want to help you do the same! That's why we offer 401(k) matching!

**REQUIREMENTS:**

To be seriously considered for this role, please have the following in regard to:

***Experience:*** 

* At least 3 years of experience in a similar role
* Experience managing people, track multiple schedules and tasking people as needed
* QuickBooks
* Microsoft Office proficiency - especially excel
* Tech savvy

***Skills:*** 

* Excellent customer service skills
* Time management skills
* Ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
* Professional verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to prioritize daily workload

**Must be able to pass a criminal background check and have a valid driver’s license.**

* **APPLY NOW!!!**

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $50,000.00 - $70,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* 401(k) matching
* Dental insurance
* Health insurance
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday
* Weekends as needed

Application Question(s):

* Briefly describe your experience in the areas of Telecommunications and or Construction.

Education:

* Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:

* Project scheduling: 2 years (Required)
* Microsoft Excel: 2 years (Required)
* Management: 3 years (Required)

Language:

* Fluent English (Required)

License/Certification:

* List any key Certifications you posses. Please describe. (Required)

Work Location: In person
